title: How to Make No Bake Pop Chow

steps.headline: Boil together 2 cups of sugar, 1/2 cup of milk, 1 stick of margarine or butter, and 2 Tbsp of cocoa for one minute.
Remove the mix from the heat and add 1 tsp of vanilla.
You can add 1/2 cup of peanut butter, 1 cup of coconut, or 1/2 cup of nuts.
Mix well and drop 1 ⁄2 inch (3.8 cm) sized balls on to a cookie sheet or wax paper to let cool.
Melt 6 oz of chocolate chips in the microwave for one minute on high.
Melt the chocolate for an additional 30 seconds or until melted.
You can stir in 1/4 cup of peanut butter or 1/2 a cup of peanuts.
Gently stir in 6 cups of rice cereal.
Pour the contents in to a Ziploc freezer bag and add 1 cup of confectioner's sugar.
To store, put in an air-tight container inside a fridge.
Make puppy chow, no-bake cookies, and popcorn.
Break the no bake cookies into pieces about a centimeter long.
Add the popcorn, no bake cookies, and puppy chow together in a large bowl or container.

text: For No Bake Cookies Boil together 2 cups of sugar, 1/2 cup of milk, 1 stick of margarine or butter, and 2 Tbsp of cocoa for one minute.  Remove the mix from the heat and add 1 tsp of vanilla.  Add 3 cups of oats.  You can add 1/2 cup of peanut butter, 1 cup of coconut, or 1/2 cup of nuts. These are all optional ingredients. Mix well and drop 1 ⁄2 inch (3.8 cm) sized balls on to a cookie sheet or wax paper to let cool.  For Puppy Chow Melt 6 oz of chocolate chips in the microwave for one minute on high.  Stir.  Melt the chocolate for an additional 30 seconds or until melted.  You can stir in 1/4 cup of peanut butter or 1/2 a cup of peanuts. These are optional ingredients. Gently stir in 6 cups of rice cereal.  Pour the contents in to a Ziploc freezer bag and add 1 cup of confectioner's sugar.  Gently shake the bag.  To store, put in an air-tight container inside a fridge.  For No Bake Pop Chow Make puppy chow, no-bake cookies, and popcorn.  Break the no bake cookies into pieces about a centimeter long.  Add the popcorn, no bake cookies, and puppy chow together in a large bowl or container.  Stir for 30 seconds.
